TEXT.BibTeX_citation: @misc{Wiki_tay_smsuk, title = smsuk, year = 2025, month = May, day = 5, note = {In Wikipedia [Atayal]}, url = {https://tay.wikipedia.org/wiki/smsuk} }

S.FORM: hwa su nyux smssyuk kmal la, baha blaq t'qwan su kwara qu llpyung, sayux su bala tayalwah.
hwa so nyox smssyok kmal la, baha blaq t'qwan so kwara qo llpyong, sayox so bala tayalwah.
